Today, the North East is lighting up with solid 7 ft @10s N swell and fresh 17 mph WNW winds. Saltburn Point and Saltburn Beach are your top picks, especially during their prime tides. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 5 ft @8s N with fresh 30 mph NW winds, making it a tough day for surf. By the day after, the swell eases to 4 ft @8s N with lighter 12 mph WNW winds, offering some workable options. Best: today.
